mapper.select: select * from user where username=#{username} AND password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, firstName, lastName, phoneNum, isAdmin) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{phoneNum}, #{isAdmin})
mapper.update: update user set username=#{username}, password=#{password}, firstName=#{firstName}, lastName=#{lastName}, phoneNum=#{phoneNum}, isAdmin=#{isAdmin} where userId=#{userId}
